name: Nerve
description:
Hurtle through beautiful unforgiving worlds, where every frame is enthralling, every moment is exhilarating, every death is deserved, and every success is earned.
You are a vessel locked on a path to your fate. You will travel through beautiful and terrifying worlds where everything is trying to stop you. Like time, you can never stop. When you die, you will be reincarnated as a new vessel. This is your fate and you are bound to it.Key FeaturesNERVE is an abstract arcade racing game focused on progression and that “just one more go” mentality featuring:
An enthralling audio visual experience
Full 10 Chapter Campaign, each with a unique Gate Keeper boss battle
Freeplay world select mode with global leader boards
Level Creation & Content Sharing toolsConquer the CampaignAs you race towards your fate, you will travel through 10 corrupted Worlds, each ending with a battle against a Gate Keeper.
Gate Keepers block you from continuing along your path and must be defeated by creatively using the mechanics of their World against them.Dominate the LeaderboardsEach World has a global leaderboard scoring system so players can see how they fair against their friends, and the world.Create and Share WorldsPlayers can build their own Worlds using
in-game tools and share them from within the game, as well as play, rank, and favourite other player’s Worlds!
